boot2dockerUrl.description: The URL of the boot2docker image. Defaults to the latest available version

cpuCount.description: number of CPUs for the machine (-1 to use the number of CPUs available)

diskSize.description: Size of disk for host in MB

hostonlyNicpromisc.description: Specify the Host Only Network Adapter Promiscuous Mode

hostonlyNictype.description: Specify the Host Only Network Adapter Type

importBoot2dockerVm.description: The name of a Boot2Docker VM to import

memory.description: Size of memory for host in MB

noShare.description: Disable the mount of your home directory
